item.title: Listening to music in the 21st century
item.description: How might I stop and appreciate music more? My musical life has been a bit stuck. I find myself not getting too excited about music these days. Maybe this is not really a problem. Or, perhaps this is just a result of my taking myself and my existential crises too seriously. Probably a bit of both. But I think there is another factor. I wonder if the emerging structure of music - e.
